correctness.description: The degree to which the solution provided is accurate and correct.

completeness.description: The extent to which the solution addresses all elements of the question.

logical_consistency.description: The logical soundness of the reasoning provided in the solution.

explanation_quality.description: The clarity and detail of the explanation of the reasoning process.

reasoning_depth.description: The depth of analysis and reasoning shown in reaching the solution.

efficiency.description: The efficiency of the reasoning process, considering the steps taken to arrive at the solution.

progress_tracking.description: The ability of the system to monitor its progress towards the solution.

collaboration.description: The effectiveness of the interaction among multiple agents to achieve the task.

diversity_of_approaches.description: The range of different methods or perspectives applied to solve the question.
